LanguageData.AvP_AllowYautjaFaction: Enable Yautja: this Should enable all Yautja factions, Scenarios, related incidents and events
LanguageData.AvP_AllowXenomorphFaction: Enable Xenomorphs:\n1this Should enable all Xenomorph related incidents and events
LanguageData.AvP_AllowHiddenInfections: Allow Hidden Impregnations:\nDisable this to stop pawns spawning impregnated
LanguageData.AvP_AllowPredalienImpregnations: Allow Predalien Impregnations: Disable this to Predaliens from being able to impregnate female pawns
LanguageData.AvP_FacehuggerRemovalDeathChance: Facehugger Removal Death Chance:\n{0}% of patient death on fail
LanguageData.AvP_EmbryoRemovalDeathChance: Embryo Removal Death Chance:\n{0}% of patient death on fail
LanguageData.AvP_AllowXenoCocoonMetamorph: Allow Cocooned pawns to be converted to Eggs if there are no Queens present
LanguageData.AvP_PredalienSpawning: Allow Predaliens: Allow Predaliens to Spawn
LanguageData.AvP_ThrumbomorphSpawning: Allow Thrumbomorphs: Allow Thrumbomorphs to Spawn
LanguageData.DesignatorRearmTrapDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again.
LanguageData.CommandRearmDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again.
LanguageData.RRYMessageMedicalOperationFailureMinorA: {SURGEON_labelShort} has failed to remove the parasite on {PATIENT_labelShort}.
LanguageData.RRYMessageMedicalOperationFailureMinorB: {SURGEON_labelShort} has failed to remove the parasite on {PATIENT_labelShort}, its blood splashes onto the floor.
LanguageData.RRYMessageMedicalOperationFailureCatastr: {SURGEON_labelShort} has failed to remove the parasite attached to {PATIENT_labelShort}, it.
LanguageData.RRYMessageMedicalOperationFailureRidicul: {SURGEON_labelShort} was trying to remove the parasite attached to {PATIENT_labelShort} and it didnt like it.....
LanguageData.RRYMessageMedicalOperationFailureFatal: something went terribly wrong while {SURGEON_labelShort} was attempting to remove the parasite attached to {PATIENT_labelShort}'s face......they didnt make it...: {2}
LanguageData.WearableExplosives_Detonate_Desc: Detonate this pawn's self destruct device.
LanguageData.WearableExplosives_Timer_Desc: Start this pawn's 10 second self destruct countdown. clicking a second time will stop the countdown
LanguageData.UseHealthShardDesc: Use a Health Shard to quickly return to the hunt
LanguageData.MedicompTendSelfDesc: Tend thier own wounds on the spot
LanguageData.USCM_Dropship_CommandAddFuelDesc: Add fuel to Cargo Pod Transport
LanguageData.ColonistsNeedRescueFromCocoonDesc:
These colonists are incapacitated in a cocoon:

{0}
Send another colonist to rescue them and carry them back to bed.

(To rescue, select another colonist, then right click on the victim and select Rescue. But beware.....
LanguageData.Xeno_Neospores_TriggerB: {0} thinks they hear a soft hiss from the {1}......
LanguageData.Xeno_Neospores_Added: {0} notices a slight haze around them and feels a slight pain in their {1}
LanguageData.Xeno_Facehugger_Attach: A parasite has attached itself to {0}'s {1}
LanguageData.Xeno_Facehugger_Detach: The parasite has detached itself from {0}...they seem OK...for now...
LanguageData.Xeno_Chestburster_PreEmerge: {0} has collapsed and is writhing around! something is wrong...
LanguageData.Xeno_Chestburster_Emerge: {0}'s convulsions stop suddenly and a Chestburster emerges in a gorey mess from {0}'s {1}
LanguageData.Xeno_Chestburster_Hides: the Chestburster disappears into the surrounding area and hides
LanguageData.Xeno_Chestburster_Matures: the Chestburster has matured into a fully grown {0}
